scripts.tsn: node --import 'data:text/javascript,import { register } from "node:module"; import { pathToFileURL } from "node:url"; register("ts-node/esm", pathToFileURL("./"));'
scripts.dev: dotenvx run -f .env.development -- npm run tsn --watch Server.ts
scripts.prod: dotenvx run -f .env.production -- npm run tsn Server.ts
scripts.migrate-dev: dotenvx run -f .env.development -- npm run tsn database/MigrationsExecutor.ts && npm run generate-types-dev
scripts.migrate-prod: dotenvx run -f .env.production -- npm run tsn database/MigrationsExecutor.ts && npm run generate-types-prod
scripts.remigrate-dev: dotenvx run -f .env.development -- npm run tsn database/MigrationsExecutor.ts -remigrate && npm run generate-types-dev
scripts.force-remigrate-prod: dotenvx run -f .env.production -- npm run tsn database/MigrationsExecutor.ts -remigrate && npm run generate-types-prod
